argument.name: %Directives%
argument.description: Refer to Xdialog Language Directives and Operators.
Character. Indicates that this is an edit combo box that will show the nearest matching value based on the characters typed in.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Numeric. Optional. The width of the control.

argument.name: Variable_Name
argument.description: Character. The name of a character variable to receive the user selection, or a numeric variable to receive the index value of the selected radio button. The index of the top-most button is 1.

argument.name: Choice_Array
argument.description: Character. An array of character values.

section.description: The formatting string %S=BLR% is used to specify that a tree control should be displayed with the familiar boxes and lines.
